name: Shrink 'N' Grow
description:
Time is something relative, if you are large, everything smaller looks faster, if you are small, larger things look slower. Have any of you ever wanted time to go by faster or slower? Well wait no longer! Watch out with the black holes! They go faster the larger you are. Electricity goes slower the larger you are, and gravity and bouncing is also affected by size! Press B to save your spot in time, but beware, you can only save 10 times! Press A then B then B then DOWN to reset game.

Github Repository:

https://agent14bricks.github.io/shrink-n-grow/

MakeCode Project:
